name: Buffalo Wings
description: Spicy and saucy finger-licking good wings. Easy to prep, made in minutes, perfect for reheating.
preparation: In a bowl, whisk together 1 tbsp seasoning, sugar, ketchup, and vinegar. Set aside.
Toss wings with remaining 2 1⁄4 tbsp seasoning. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Bake for 25–30 min, or until cooked through.
Toss cooked wings in prepared sauce.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
